colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @046A *, ,(SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MAN NGAG GI @046B BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA, RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA MGON POS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI PAndI TA GO MI 'CHI MED DANG, LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE LEGS PAR GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,'DI LTAR GZHUNG MCHOG BRIS DANG PAR BSGRUBS PA'I, DGE BA 'DIS MTSAN SKYE 'PHAGS JI SNYED DGE ,BSNGO MAS PA'I MTHU LAS PHYOGS RNAMS THAMS CAD DU, LAM BZANG 'DI NYID DAR ZHING RGYAS PHYIR BSNGO, DE YI MTHU LAS @047A *, ,MKHA' MNYAM MAR GYUR GYUR 'GRO, THEG MCHOG 'KHOR LO BZHI LDAN RTEN THOB NAS, LUNG RTOGS DAM PA'I CHOS TSUL KUN BZANG STE, BLA MED RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB MYUR THOB SHOG ,BLA MA MCHOG GSUM BYIN RLABS THUGS RJE DANG, BDAG CAG LHAG BSAM DANG MOS CHOS DBYINGS MTHUS,GCIG TU TSOGS PA'I RTEN 'BREL BDEN STOBS KYIS, DON GNYIS LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,)
